transfer_memos.bot_disabled: Refund for invalid bid: {amount} - The bot is currently disabled.
transfer_memos.below_min_bid: Refund for invalid bid: {amount} - Min bid amount is {min_bid}.
transfer_memos.above_max_bid: Refund for invalid bid: {amount} - Max bid amount is {max_bid}.
transfer_memos.invalid_currency: Refund for invalid bid: {amount} - Bids in {currency} are not accepted.
transfer_memos.no_comments: Refund for invalid bid: {amount} - Bids not allowed on comments.
transfer_memos.already_voted: Refund for invalid bid: {amount} - Bot already voted on this post.
transfer_memos.max_age: Refund for invalid bid: {amount} - Posts cannot be older than {max_age}.
transfer_memos.invalid_post_url: Refund for invalid bid: {amount} - Invalid post URL in memo.
